column2: Western Asset Mortgage Capital Corp. is a real estate investment trust, which engages in managing a diversified portfolio of assets. The company is headquartered in Pasadena, California and currently employs 1 full-time employees. The firm is focused on investing in, financing and managing a diversified portfolio of real estate-related securities, whole-loans and other financial assets. The firm's portfolio includes Agency residential mortgage-backed securities (RMBS), including Mortgage pass-through certificates, Agency derivatives, Agency Interest-Only Strips and Agency collateralized mortgage obligations (CMOs); Non-Agency RMBS, and Agency commercial mortgage-backed securities (CMBS), Non-Agency CMBS, Non United States CMBS and asset-backed securities (ABS), as well as Residential and Commercial Whole-Loans. The firm may utilize to-be-announced forward contracts (TBAs), in order to invest in Agency RMBS. The firm's manager is Western Asset Management Company.
